import React from 'react' import { Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from 'reactstrap' import '../styles.css' const Sidebar = ({ isOpen, onClose, dataset, totalUsers, selectedUsers, totalTime, }) => { const datasetInfo = [ { label: 'Dataset Name', value: dataset }, { label: 'Number of Users', value: `${selectedUsers} / ${totalUsers}` }, { label: 'Total Time', value: totalTime }, ] return ( isOpen && (
e.clientX > 250 && onClose()}>
